about_the_game: Embark on an epic journey in Ninja Rift, an immersive RPG where you create and customize your own ninja. Level up your skills, master powerful techniques, and join forces with clans and crews to dominate the battlefield. Challenge other ninjas in intense battles, prove your prowess, and rise to become the ultimate ninja warrior. In Ninja Rift, the path to greatness is paved with strategy, skill, and unwavering determination. Will you conquer the rift and claim your place as the best ninja of all? Join now and begin your adventure!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-3220
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 10 compatible GPU with 1GB VRAM (e.g., NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650 / AMD Radeon HD 7750 or integrated graphics with sufficient power)
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Ensure your drivers and operating system are up to date.
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600 / AMD Ryzen 5 1600 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 compatible GPU with 2GB VRAM (e.g., NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 / AMD Radeon RX 560)
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Ensure your drivers and operating system are up to date.
